short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows Flock Fantasy users to easily sync their private ESPN leagues to Flock Fantasy tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flock Fantasy ESPN sync. Be able to analyze your team quickly and easily without having to make your league public or manage your authentication. Use for this extension is purely for syncing your ESPN league to Flock Fantasy. Please reach out in our Discord if you have any issues with this extension.
